attributes.title: GARBAGE APP
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app only to realize my eyes started bleeding from how awful the quality is. Literally rn I’m in the hospital because of the blood pouring through my eyes. I have no other option but to poor bleach into my eyes and mouth to save my life from this disgusting time wasting useless app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!! 

- love, Tiktok community 🥰🤩🧚🏻✨

attributes.title: Inappropriate photos of trump and ivanka😱
attributes.review: I can not believe this! After opening this app for ONE minute all of my data were WIPED away and my phone was filled with extremely inappropriate photos of POTUS with his daughter, Ivanka😱I am a minor and I am UTTERLY disgusted by everything that’s happened. smh please REMOVE this app to protect our children!!!!

attributes.title: Trump 2020😍🤩ON A GRAVESTONE 🧚‍♀️🥰😹😘
attributes.review: HI MY NAME IS KAREN MITCHELL IM 54 I HAVE 2 KIDS AND I AM VERYYYYY ANGRY WITH THIS APP. SO MY DAUGHTER SHOW ME THIS APP AND I WAS SUPER EXCITED BECAUSE I WAS A TRUMP SUPPORTER ENTAIL THIS APP 😤. SO IT ALL STARTED ON A SATURDAY WHEN I DOWNLOAD THE APP THIS APP 2 SECONDS IN THE APP IT TOOK ME TO THIS WEIRD PAGE CALL UMM WHAT WAS IT CALL AGAIN OH YEAH PORN HUB IT WAS WEIRD BUT I WAS VERY SCHOCK BUT I LET IT GO. SO A FEW WEEKS LATER I HAD LEARNED THIS TRICK WHERE I CAN CONNECT MY PHONE WITH THE TV AND I WANTED TO SHOW THE APP TO MY FAMILY SO I SAT THEM DOWN AND I WAS 5 MINUTES INTO THE APP AND EVERYTHING WAS GOING GOOD ENTAIL THE PORN VIDEO STARTED PLAYING THE PORN VIDEO ON MY PHONE AND ON THE TV AND MY WHOLE FAMILY SAW AND WHILE I WAS TRYING TO GET IT OFF MY IPHONE 11 JUST EXPLODE AND FINALLY THE PORN VIDEO WAS GONE SO DONT DOWNLOAD THIS IF U DONT WANT THIS TO HAPPEN 😤🥰🧚‍♀️😍😘🤩💕

attributes.title: Don’t ban tiktok 😡
attributes.review: I am here with the tiktok community, don’t ban tiktok you orange lookin boi 🍊 Cheeto looking boi Corn on the cob hair looking boi🌾 or we “the tiktok community” will just take you dumb app off the App Store. So you either take off tiktok because your buthert or you can accept the fact that your a bad president and that we will not stop to get you out of the White House

attributes.title: A clown..
attributes.review: I just came on here to support the great orange of a president that we have. But he posted a tweet that said global warming was made up by the Chinese and women deserve to be rapped for going into the military. So I was tryna delete it, and the stupid app crashed my phone. So can we cancel this app and our “great” orange box head of a president while we’re at it?!

attributes.title: This app is awful.
attributes.review: I’ve seen the whole gen z thing trying to get this app deleted but this app is actually horrible. When I opened the app I got scared. There was a living breathing Cheeto on the screen waving at me. It scared me so much. This app should be deleted because as we all know, scaring wittle babiez is against the Apple App Store guidelines.

attributes.title: Laggy
attributes.review: The app is overall extremely hard to navigate. It’s also clunky clicking any button will cause it to take around 10 seconds to move tabs. (I’m also on an iPhone 11 so it’s nothing near to phone issues. All other apps work seamlessly.

attributes.title: ✨WhO iN 🤢tHe 😗HeLl🤪 PuT 🍊tHe 🌧OrAnGeS 🌈oN 🌸tHiS 🌚aPp✨
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible this app had an orange on it and the orange was so old and past expiration date it looked so NASTY it made the blood come out of my eyes and nose and ears and mouth then it made me puke and fart out unicorns 🦄 🦄🦄 I DEFINITELY DONOT RECOMMEND THIS APP someone please take it away before it does more damage the devil orange lives here 👹🍊👹🍊👹🍊

attributes.title: Not impressed
attributes.review: I downloaded the app just to find that it was poorly set up and not very well organized. I was absolutely baffled when opening the app because everything was so busy and I couldn’t tell how to navigate it at all. Don’t download this app it’s a waste of time.

attributes.title: ✨awful✨
attributes.review: I genuinely downloaded the app to learn more about this man but was very disappointed. Very low quality, hard to maneuver the app and was appalled to keep seeing this orange, Oompa Loompa man on the screen. I Suggest to take him off and the app would be much better. Not great and wouldn’t download again, but better.
